alert.note: Alert for Benzie; Manistee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 2:39AM EDT until April 05 at 3:15AM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: The National Weather Service in Gaylord has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Benzie County in northern Michigan... Northern Manistee County in northern Michigan... * Until 315 AM EDT. * At 239 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pierport, or 12 miles north of Manistee, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Frankfort, Thompsonville, Beulah, Arcadia, Benzonia, Onekama, Elberta, Honor, Bear Lake, Copemish, Pierport, Wildwood, Platte Township, Bendon, Pere Marquette State Forest, Wallin and Blaine Township. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
